summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 223 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1806 m), feels like temperature (up 2.8°C), outside temperature (up 2.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 223.5m lower than yesterday, 752.3m lower than the past week, 1806.3m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 713m to 1594m and averaged 843.5m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok and very little to no wind will be present. Light to moderate rain is forecast, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and the light is absent. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
